channel.title: Armor Tab Freezes Whole Client When Clicked On plz help
channel.description:
Hi,
I have searched for over a hour for a fix for my problem but have not found one, so don't come in and tell me "Use search button" If you can find a fix at least just post me a link, maybe I didn't see the topic. Ok well here is my problem:
I run the server and client and everything is working find :D! But then I click on the armor tab, and the whole client freezes, then I have to restart the client. I know its a server problem because I tried to click on the tab with 5 different clients and the same problem, BTW: I am not really too sure about my server source, I got it a long time ago, I am using DeltaScape Client.
Please help me and if you don't have a solution to this and are just gonna tell me to search or flame me please leave, I need actual people that can help flamers really have never helped and should just leave, so thanks again if you can help and if your a flame please leave :)
Thanks, Busta

item.title: Armor Tab Freezes Whole Client When Clicked On plz help
item.dc:creator: @busta123 busta123
item.description:
@busta123 wrote:

i put on full rune (Which is not nulled or anything) and it still isnt working maybe i need to add the class ? But idk the armor tab class number or how to make the tab open

Read full topic
item.source: Armor Tab Freezes Whole Client When Clicked On plz help

item.title: Armor Tab Freezes Whole Client When Clicked On plz help
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

You’re probably wearing an item that your client you’re on doesn’t support, and therefore is crashing you. I know you said you’ve tried 5 different clients, but a lot of the clients out there were based from one certain client.

Read full topic
item.source: Armor Tab Freezes Whole Client When Clicked On plz help
